title: Rock Creek Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for ways to get involved with Rock Creek Park? Look below to find opportunities.   NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. We invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover and be inspired.  Volunteer You can make a difference by volunteering at Rock Creek Park.  SOLVE The Sustaining Our Lands with Volunteer Energy (SOLVE) program enables community groups to adopt and take care of parts of the park.   Work with us  People work with Rock Creek Park in many capacities including internships, seasonal, part-time and full-time paid staff.   Planning The National Park Service prepares a variety of planning and environmental documents to help guide management of park resources.   Support your Park Looking for ways to support your park? There are numerous ways in which you can.
